DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Evaluate Safety Efficacy CCX168 ANCA-Associated Vasculitis
DOC.detailed_description: Complement 5a receptor C5aR ( CD88 ) involve pathogenesis anti-neutrophil cytoplasmic antibody ( ANCA ) -associated vasculitis . This randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled Phase 2 study evaluate safety efficacy C5aR inhibitor CCX168 subject ANCA-associated vasculitis . The aim trial test safety efficacy two dose regimen complement C5a receptor CCX168 patient anti-neutrophil cytoplasmic antibody ( ANCA ) -associated vasculitis ( AAV ) .
